mapper.insert: insert into t_gonggao (gonggaoId, gonggaoName, gonggaoMark, gonggaoImg, gonggaoImgName, gonggaoDate, ggtypeId, ggtypeName) values (#{gonggaoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gonggaoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gonggaoMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gonggaoImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gonggaoImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gonggaoDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ggtypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ggtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_gonggao set gonggaoName = #{gonggaoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gonggaoMark = #{gonggaoMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gonggaoImg = #{gonggaoImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gonggaoImgName = #{gonggaoImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gonggaoDate = #{gonggaoDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ggtypeId = #{ggtypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ggtypeName = #{ggtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where gonggaoId = #{gonggaoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select gonggaoId, gonggaoName, gonggaoMark, gonggaoImg, gonggaoImgName, gonggaoDate, ggtypeId, ggtypeName from t_gonggao where gonggaoId = #{gonggaoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
